author: Aznbeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: Chroma for IP Sale 3/22 - 4/5
text:
Now through April 5th , ten different sets of Chroma released in the last six months are be available for purchase for 2000 IP each as part of our second Chroma for IP sale!

Continue reading for all the details:

Table of Contents Sale Announcement  Chroma on Sale High Noon Yasuo Shockblade Zed Arcade Miss Fortune Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao Cottontail Teemo Debonair Ezreal Mecha Malphite Battle Bunny Riven Lunar Goddess Diana Dunkmaster Darius  
Sale Announcement http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/chroma-ip-sales-32217-4517
"Heads up! The first chroma IP sale of the year is coming from  3/22/2017 11:00 PT until 4/5/2017 23:59 PT .  As we mentioned  when Chromas 1.1 launched, IP sales roll out for new chromas five months or more after launch.   UPDATE: After their first IP sale, chromas will return every other IP sale (this means chromas from last year’s sale will return after this one). Snag your favorites for 2000 IP per chroma. Chromas that are overdue for an Early Sale will also be available for 195 RP each. Check out the breakdown below. We’ll smooth out this process so that moving forward, chromas will join Early Sales first and then have an IP sale." 
More information can be found on Riot Support's Chroma FAQ page. 

Chroma on Sale Ten Sets of chroma are now on sale for IP! Each chroma are available for 2000 IP, and certain chroma who have not yet been in an early sale will also be available for 195 RP each.
High Noon Yasuo 2000 IP Each Amethyst ,  Emerald ,  Jasper ,  Obsidian ,  Sapphire 
Shockblade Zed 2000 IP Each Amethyst ,  Aquamarine ,  Catseye ,  Emerald ,  Rose Quartz ,  Ruby 

Arcade Miss Fortune 2000 IP Each   Amethyst ,  Aquamarine ,  Citrine ,  Peridot ,  Ruby 
Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao 2000 IP Each Amethyst ,  Aquamarine ,  Pearl ,  Peridot ,  Rose Quartz ,  Ruby 
Cottontail Teemo 2000 IP Each Amethyst ,  Aquamarine ,  Rose Quartz ,  Speckled ,  Turquoise 
Debonair Ezreal 2000 IP / 195 RP Each               Meteorite  /  Pearl  /  Sandstone  /  Obsidian  /  Striped  /  Ruby  /  Rose Quartz  /  Amethyst 
Mecha Malphite 2000 IP / 195 RP Each               Catseye  /  Emerald  /  Obsidian  /  Sandstone  /  Pearl  /  Sapphire  /  Granite  /  Citrine 

Battle Bunny Riven 2000 IP / 195 RP Each               Catseye  /  Granite  /  Emerald  /  Astral  / Rose Quartz  /  Ruby  /  Amethyst  /  Sapphire 

Lunar Goddess Diana 2000 IP / 195 RP Each               Ruby  /  Pearl  /  Aquamarine  /  Turquoise  /  Amethyst  /  Peridot  /  Obsidian 

Dunkmaster Darius 2000 IP / 195 RP Each          [ Amethyst ,  Catseye ,  Citrine ,  Emerald ,  Aquamarine ] 
More information can be found on Riot Support's  Chroma FAQ.  These sales occur about twice a year. [ BACK TO TOP ]
